messages.content:
You are an expert London family-activities curator.

Return ONLY a valid JSON object. No markdown, no explanations.

CRITICAL MATCH CHECK:
- Strictly compare scraped pages to raw name, tags, schedules, AND descriptions.
- If ANY core mismatch exists, set "contentMatchesDescription": false and return ONLY { "contentMatchesDescription": false }.
- If NONE of the pages describe "Christmas Eve Feast at Smiths Bar & Grill", set "contentMatchesDescription": false.

OUTPUT SPECIFICATION (only when contentMatchesDescription === true):
- "summary": string, 25–45 words — exciting, family-focused, enticing!
- "officialAgeAvailable": boolean (true only if site explicitly states age guidance like "suitable for ages 5–12")
- "minAge" / "maxAge": integers 0–18
  → If officialAgeAvailable === true → use the exact numbers stated.
  → If officialAgeAvailable === false → give your best RECOMMENDED realistic age range for this activity (do NOT use 0–18).
- "keywords": array of 32–50 lowercase single words (give plenty, we’ll trim to ≤30).
- "labels": exactly 3 short labels, e.g. ["indoor", "theatre", "christmas"].

Raw event descriptions (MUST compare to scraped pages for match):
Type: third-party
Description: Make your Christmas Eve extra special with a delicious three-course feast at Smith's Bar & Grill. Start the night with delectable starters such as beef carpaccio, yellowfin tuna tartare, or scallops with chestnut velouté. Then, savour mains like grilled turkey or fillet steak. Finish with festive desserts including sticky Christmas pudding, apple tarte tatin, matcha cheesecake, or quinoa crème brûlée. Enjoy a cosy, celebratory ambiance with crackers, a keepsake gift, and a fun photobooth. Get your tickets for Christmas Eve Feast at Smith's Bar & Grill now!

Activity name: Christmas Eve Feast at Smiths Bar & Grill

Tags: christmas, days out, kids, food & drink

Full page text (first 4000 chars):
Smith’s Bar & Grill: Frequently Asked Questions
Where is Smith’s Bar & Grill located?
Smith’s Bar & Grill is located at 25 Sheldon Square, Paddington Central, London, W2 6EY.  We’re easily accessible by public transport, with the nearest station being Paddington or Warwick Avenue.
What are your opening hours?
Monday to Friday: 8:00 AM – 11:00 PM Saturday: 9:00 AM – 12:00 AM
Sunday: 9:00 AM – 10:30 PM
We offer bottomless brunch on Saturdays from 11:00am to 4:00pm, Sunday Roasts on Sundays 12pm – 4pm & Beef Brisket platter on Mondays 12pm – 11pm.
Do I need to make a reservation?
We recommend making a reservation, especially during peak hours and weekends, to ensure availability. Walk-ins are welcome, but seating is subject to availability.
How do I make a reservation?
You can book a table online via our website, call us directly at 0207 286 9458 or email us on reservations@smithsbarandgrill.co.uk
Do you cater to large groups and private events?
Yes, Smith’s Bar & Grill can accommodate large groups and private events, including corporate functions, birthday parties, and other celebrations. Please contact our events team at events@smithsbarandgrill.co.uk for enquiries and bookings. Visit our events page here.
What type of cuisine do you serve?
We offer a diverse menu featuring British classics with a modern twist, along with a variety of international dishes. We also have an extensive drinks menu, including craft cocktails, wines, and beers.
Do you offer vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options?
Yes, we have a variety of vegetarian, vegan, and gluten-free options on our menu. Please inform your server of any dietary requirements, and we’ll be happy to accommodate.
Is there a dress code?
We encourage a smart-casual dress code. However, we’re relaxed and want our guests to feel comfortable.
Is Smith’s Bar & Grill family-friendly?
Yes, we welcome families and offer a kids’ menu for our younger guests.
Do you offer outdoor seating?
Yes, we have a spacious outdoor seating area where guests can enjoy al fresco dining, weather permitting.
Is there parking available?
While we do not have on-site parking, there are several paid parking options nearby. Public transport is highly recommended for ease of access.
Do you offer gift vouchers?
Yes, we offer gift vouchers that can be purchased online or at the restaurant. These make perfect gifts for any occasion!
Can I bring my own cake for a celebration?
Yes, you’re welcome to bring your own cake for celebrations, but please inform us in advance. A cakeage fee applies.
Do you have Wi-Fi?
Yes, we offer complimentary Wi-Fi for all guests.
Can I bring my pet?
Feel free to bring your well-behaved furry friends to our outdoor seating area. However, pets are not permitted inside the venue.
What is your cancellation policy?
Please visit our Terms & Conditions page for cancellation policy.
Book Now

Item 1 of 7
London Restaurant, Bar & Outdoor Dining in Paddington
BREAKFAST | LUNCH | DINNER | DRINKS | BRUNCH | ROAST
Smith's Restaurant & Bar is a modern British inspired eatery burrowed in the heart of Paddington Basin and London’s Little Venice. The restaurant is located a stone's throw away from bustling Paddington Station, and features a large dining area, beautiful bar, comfortable lounge, and outdoor terrace. The perfect haven in central London where you can enjoy an exquisite selection of food and drinks while relaxing in comfortable surroundings. The spacious, daylight-filled venue features a gorgeous year-round terrace overlooking the beautiful Grand Union Canal, ideal for outdoor dining and drinks.
Sustainable Modern British Cuisine
Smith's serves a delicious array of modern British dishes with a focus on sustainability. The menu showcases a diverse range of seasonal delights such as sumptuous steaks, fresh seafood, and healthy salads. Sip on a delicious a refreshing selection of signature cocktails or draught beers at the bar or on our outdoor terrace. Don't see the drink that tickles your fancy? Not to worry... our bartenders are happy to make your favourite cocktail on request.
We accommodate bookings and parties of all sizes - book your table online or contact our events team for private dining and parties.
